items.title: Kaynes Tech, Dixon Tech, other EMS stocks surge up to 7% after PM Modi's visit to China
items.description: EMS companies have strong ties with Chinese component manufacturers. The earlier tensions between India and China following geopolitical disputes had impacted the stocks, as investors remained concerned over supply chain disruption.

items.title: Nifty Bulls Reclaim 24,600 Amid Solid GDP Print, GST Optimism; Autos, IT Shine| Closing Bell Live|4K
items.description: Near 200 point surge on the Nifty. Nifty reclaims 24,600; ends near day's high. GDP print, GST optimism leads to a strong start to september. Broader markets fired up; Nifty midcap up 2%. NSE advance-decline ratio at 5:2. Autos lead from the front; idex up nearly 3%. IT, PSU banks, realty in fine fettle; Pharma under pressure. Catch Nandita Khemka in conversation with Nirav R karkera, Head of Research, Fisdom.

items.title: Ajanta Pharma shares fall nearly 1% amid high volume; stock among top losers on Nifty Midcap 150
items.description: With the stock's last traded price at Rs 2,453.60, Ajanta Pharma experienced a decline amid high volume in today's session, with the stock included as one of the stocks in the Nifty Midcap 150 index.

items.title: EV makers Ola, Ather’s shares soar on hopes of easier access to Chinese rare earth magnets, GST reform benefits
items.description: Ola Electric shares hit an intraday high of Rs 61.88 apiece, while Ather Energy shares hit an all-time high of Rs 512.80 apiece, as seen at 12.50 am.

items.title: Mid, smallcap indices surge up to 2%, snap multi-day losses: Here are the top gainers
items.description: Nifty Smallcap 100 index gained more than 1.4 percent (around 242 points) to trade at around 17,469. The index has now snapped a six-day losing streak.

items.title: MRF share price rises 2.25% in today's trading
items.description: With the share price at Rs 144120.00, MRF saw a price increase of 2.25% in today's session and is a constituent of the Nifty Midcap 150 index.

items.description: Shares of Bosch gained 2.15% to trade at Rs 40,820.00 in Monday's session.

items.title: Maruti Suzuki India shares hit 52-week high
items.description: With the stock currently trading at Rs 14,894.00, Maruti Suzuki India has demonstrated strong financial performance and positive investor sentiment.

items.title: Global Health shares rise 2.09% in today's trading

items.title: From today, listed firms must provide granular disclosures for related party transactions
items.description: SEBI had called for more granular information that needs to be shared to shareholders and audit committee for approval of proposals.
